title: Generate Video
description: Generate and edit short videos from text prompts using AI video generation models
author: Jarvis Inc
curl_example: curl -X POST https://api.openai.com/v1/videos/generations -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY" -d '{"model": "sora", "prompt": "A drone flyover of a futuristic city at sunset", "duration": 10, "resolution": "1080p"}'

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate a video from a text prompt

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Detailed text description of the video to generate

returns.description: Generated video object with url, duration, resolution, and generation metadata

commands.name: edit
commands.description: Edit an existing video based on text instructions

parameters.name: video_url
parameters.description: URL of the source video to edit

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: Natural language description of the desired edits (e.g. 'change the sky to a starry night')

returns.description: Edited video object with url and edit summary
